title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 373.5 - Payment of benefit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 373.5 - Payment of benefit

State Regulations

Benefits under the plan shall be paid only if the participant
is receiving benefits from the system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
373.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
